articles.title: Dow rallies, S&P 500 is flat as investors rotate out of tech to start new quarter: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose on Tuesday as investors rotated out of technology stocks to kick off the second half of 2025.
articles.content:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed on Tuesday as investors rotated out of technology stocks to kick off the second half of 2025.

articles.title: Nothing releases its first over-the-ear headphones, the $299 Headphone (1) - TechCrunch
articles.description: Nothing stepped away from sensors in favor of a simple button to trigger your AI assistant or ChatGPT, if you have the Nothing X app, and a volume roller that can also be pressed to play, pause, and turn on and off noise canceling.
articles.content: London-based smartphone maker Nothing has launched its first over-the-ear headphones, the Headphone (1). The new device follows Nothing’s first step into audio hardware with last year’s debut of the … [+1429 chars]

articles.title: Trump threatens to deport Elon Musk as feud with tech titan reignites: ‘We’ll have to take a look’ - New York Post
articles.description: “Elon may get more subsidy than any human being in history, by far, and without subsidies, Elon would probably have to close up shop and head back home to South Africa,” Trump said.
